verses.verse: Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H6258>"Now<s%> you shall <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H834>what<s%> I will <S%H6213>do<s%> to <S%H6547>Pharaoh;<s%> for under <S%H2389>compulsion<s%> <S%H3027><s%> he shall <S%H7971>let<s%> them <S%H7971>go,<s%> and under <S%H2389>compulsion<s%> <S%H3027><s%> he shall <S%H1644>drive<s%> them out of his <S%H776>land.<s%>"
<S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> further to <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to him, "I am the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%>

and I <S%H7200>appeared<s%> to <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> <S%H3327>Isaac,<s%> and <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> as <S%H410>God<s%> <S%H7706>Almighty,<s%> but [by] My <S%H8034>name,<s%> <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> I did not <S%H3045>make<s%> Myself <S%H3045>known<s%> to them.

"And I <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H6965>established<s%> My <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with them, to <S%H5414>give<s%> them the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> in <S%H834>which<s%> they <S%H1481>sojourned.<s%>

"And <S%H1571>furthermore<s%> I have <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H5009>groaning<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H834>because<s%> the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> are <S%H5647>holding<s%> them in <S%H5647>bondage;<s%> and I have <S%H2142>remembered<s%> My <S%H1285>covenant.<s%>

<S%H559>"Say,<s%> <S%H3651>therefore,<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> 'I am the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> and I will <S%H3318>bring<s%> you out from <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H5450>burdens<s%> of the <S%H4714>Egyptians,<s%> and I will <S%H5337>deliver<s%> you from their <S%H5656>bondage.<s%> I will also <S%H1350>redeem<s%> you with an <S%H5186>outstretched<s%> <S%H2220>arm<s%> and with <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H8201>judgments.<s%>

'Then I will <S%H3947>take<s%> you for My <S%H5971>people,<s%> and I will be your <S%H430>God;<s%> and you shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> who <S%H3318>brought<s%> you out from <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H5450>burdens<s%> of the <S%H4714>Egyptians.<s%>

'And I will <S%H935>bring<s%> you to the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H5375>swore<s%> <S%H3027><s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> to <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> <S%H3327>Isaac,<s%> and <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> and I will <S%H5414>give<s%> it to you [for] a <S%H4181>possession;<s%> I am the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>' "

So <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H3651>thus<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> but they did not <S%H8085>listen<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses<s%> on <S%H4480>account<s%> of [their] <S%H7115>despondency<s%> <S%H7307><s%> and <S%H7186>cruel<s%> <S%H5656>bondage.<s%>
Now the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H935>"Go,<s%> <S%H1696>tell<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> to <S%H7971>let<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7971>go<s%> out of his <S%H776>land.<s%>"

But <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H2005>"Behold,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> have not <S%H8085>listened<s%> to me; <S%H349>how<s%> then will <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H8085>listen<s%> to me, for I am <S%H6189>unskilled<s%> in <S%H8193>speech<s%>?"

Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and to <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> and <S%H6680>gave<s%> them a <S%H6680>charge<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and to <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> to <S%H3318>bring<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

<S%H428>These<s%> are the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of their fathers' <S%H1004>households.<s%> The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben,<s%> Israel's first-born: <S%H2585>Hanoch<s%> and <S%H6396>Pallu,<s%> <S%H2696>Hezron<s%> and <S%H3756>Carmi;<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H4940>families<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H8095>Simeon:<s%> <S%H3223>Jemuel<s%> and <S%H3226>Jamin<s%> and <S%H161>Ohad<s%> and <S%H3199>Jachin<s%> and <S%H6714>Zohar<s%> and <S%H7586>Shaul<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of a <S%H3669>Canaanite<s%> <S%H3669>woman;<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H4940>families<s%> of <S%H8095>Simeon.<s%>

And <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H8034>names<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%> according to their <S%H8435>generations:<s%> <S%H1648>Gershon<s%> and <S%H6955>Kohath<s%> and <S%H4847>Merari;<s%> and the <S%H8141>length<s%> of Levi's <S%H9132>life<s%> was one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and thirty-seven <S%H8141>years.<s%>
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1648>Gershon:<s%> <S%H3845>Libni<s%> and <S%H8096>Shimei,<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6955>Kohath:<s%> <S%H6019>Amram<s%> and <S%H3324>Izhar<s%> and <S%H9116>Hebron<s%> and <S%H5816>Uzziel;<s%> and the <S%H8141>length<s%> of Kohath's <S%H9132>life<s%> was one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and thirty-three <S%H8141>years.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4847>Merari:<s%> <S%H4249>Mahli<s%> and <S%H4187>Mushi.<s%> <S%H428>These<s%> are the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> according to their <S%H8435>generations.<s%>

And <S%H6019>Amram<s%> <S%H3947>married<s%> <S%H802><s%> his father's <S%H1733>sister<s%> <S%H3115>Jochebed,<s%> and she <S%H3205>bore<s%> him <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and <S%H4872>Moses;<s%> and the <S%H8141>length<s%> of Amram's <S%H9132>life<s%> was one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and thirty-seven <S%H8141>years.<s%>
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3324>Izhar:<s%> <S%H7141>Korah<s%> and <S%H5298>Nepheg<s%> and <S%H2147>Zichri.<s%>
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5816>Uzziel:<s%> <S%H4332>Mishael<s%> and <S%H469>Elzaphan<s%> and <S%H5644>Sithri.<s%>

And <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H3947>married<s%> <S%H802><s%> <S%H472>Elisheba,<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H5992>Amminadab,<s%> the <S%H269>sister<s%> of <S%H5177>Nahshon,<s%> and she <S%H3205>bore<s%> him <S%H5070>Nadab<s%> and <S%H30>Abihu,<s%> <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> and <S%H385>Ithamar.<s%>
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7141>Korah:<s%> <S%H617>Assir<s%> and <S%H511>Elkanah<s%> and <S%H23>Abiasaph;<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H7145>Korahites.<s%>

And Aaron's <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> <S%H3947>married<s%> <S%H802><s%> <S%H4480>one<s%> of the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H6317>Putiel,<s%> and she <S%H3205>bore<s%> him <S%H6372>Phinehas.<s%> <S%H428>These<s%> are the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the fathers' [households] of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families.<s%>

It was [the same] <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and <S%H4872>Moses<s%> to <S%H834>whom<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3318>"Bring<s%> out the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> from the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> <S%H5921>according<s%> to their <S%H6635>hosts.<s%>"

They were the ones who <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> about <S%H3318>bringing<s%> out the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> from <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%> it was [the same] <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron.<s%>
Now it <S%H1961>came<s%> about on the <S%H3117>day<s%> when the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%>

that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "I am the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> <S%H1696>speak<s%> to <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that I <S%H1696>speak<s%> to you."

But <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H2005>"Behold,<s%> I am <S%H6189>unskilled<s%> in <S%H8193>speech;<s%> <S%H349>how<s%> then will <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H8085>listen<s%> to me?"
